The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 04 February is 3,408,879 (6,056.2 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 30 January, there were 146,686 new confirmed cases (260.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 23 January, there were 210,459 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 30% (63,773 fewer cases).
